document_data.name: Drill Field
document_data.mainbody: The '''drill field''' was an open practice ground located in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The drill field was located in western Daggerford south of the [[Daggerford/Caravan Quarter|Caravan Quarter]].
document_data.Activities: This area was used on a daily basis for training by soldiers, members of the [[Daggerford militia]], and the constabulary. The drill field was also used to temporarily house caravans if the market was crowded.
